2016-2018

Continued to update website with banners, landing pages, blog & modals. Designed emails, social ads & DM’s for promotions & customer communication. Prepared

Bitmaker Web Dev Bootcamp

Full Time Student
Jan 2018-April 2018

Attending & completing Bitmaker's Web Dev bootcamp was a big step in the transition of my career from a print designer to a web designer. Throughout my time at Bitmaker, I gained experience coding web pages and applications, with my main focus on CSS and software/web app structure. After graduating in mid-April, I focused on my job search and continuous learning.

Grand & Toy

Web Designer
Jun 2018-Present

Design & code customer journeys & experiences for online marketing communication (landing pages, onsite messaging, emails, web banners, site components). Focusing on designing for G&T's preferred customer program (Business Select), Rewards Program (Grand Rewards) and subscription/services programs. Working with project managers, front end devs, marketing management & fellow designers.
